{{Change History/Header}}
[[Version 3.0]]
* The 4-Piece Bonus of Thundering Fury was updated:
** '''{{Color|Old effect}}:''' Increases damage caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged and Superconduct by 40%. Triggering such effects decreases Elemental Skill CD by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
** '''{{Color|New effect}}:''' Increases DMG caused by Overloaded, Electro-Charged, Superconduct, and {{Highlight|Hyperbloom}} by 40%, {{Highlight|and the DMG Bonus conferred by Aggravate is increased by 20%}}. When {{Highlight|Quicken}} or the aforementioned Elemental Reactions are triggered, Elemental Skill CD is decreased by 1s. Can only occur once every 0.8s.
----
[[Version 2.3]]
* Changed the gender pronoun of the Thunderbird from "he" to "she" in the artifact lore description of the Omen of Thunderstorm piece in the Thundering Fury artifact set.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
* Thundering Fury was released.
